name: Lock Him Up!
description:
Make America Safe Again!

Poor Mr. President is completely lost and you must catch him. A drunken pilot will help you. Click with your mouse anywhere in the game window to release the cage. 
Kabuff is a small game studio located in Hamburg. Our main project is a Realtime Strategy Chemtrail Simulation. However, from time to time one needs a little break and then something like "Lock Him Up" comes into being. 

If you want to get always the latest news about REPTRAILS and games like "Lock Him Up!" you may follow us on Facebook (only german atm) or at Twitter (international germlish atm):
https://www.facebook.com/bundesmanipulator/
https://twitter.com/reptrails
